AddressCountry.description: ISO 3166-1 country codes alpha-2 or alpha-3

activityDescription.description: Short description of the activity to distinguish different activities in the establishment. Use of food sector specific terminology. E.g. definition of the production lot.

stationId.description: This parameter describes the station, where the activity is performed. This could be an establishment, a storage facility, a transportation mean, or a virtual station in case of trade and consumption.

activityStart.description: Start of time period, when the activity was performed, e.g. the time a new lot was produced. For continuous production this would be the lot defining period.

activityEnd.description: End of time period, when the activity was performed, e.g. the time a new lot was produced. For continuous production this would be the lot defining period.

items.description:
Set of primary activities, which constitute the reported activity in terms of traceability. 
Depending on the primary activities specific characteristics of the input items will be changed during their transformation into the output items.

activityPrimaryType.description:
Set of primary activities, which constitute the reported activity in terms of traceability. 
Depending on the primary activities specific characteristics of the input items will be changed during their transformation into the output items.

truIds.description: Input traceable resources units possibly used in the activity. The data structure allows specifying more input TRUs than actually used.

quantityNumber.description: The quantity of the input resource used in the activity

quantityUnit.description: The measurement unit of the net quantity

isNetQuantity.description: Indicates, whether the quantity is given as a net value.

tradeUnitCount.description: The number of trade units with known net quantities, used in the activity

items.description: If the trade units are individually identifiable, a list of TU identifiers of trade units with known net quantity actually used in the activity, e.g. the serial extended GTINs of all TUs.

tradeUnits.description: If the trade units are individually identifiable, a list of TU identifiers of trade units with known net quantity actually used in the activity, e.g. the serial extended GTINs of all TUs.

useStart.description: Start of time period, when the resource unit was used in the activity

useEnd.description: End of time period, when the resource unit was used in the activity

ambientControl.description: Conditions of short-term storage of inputs, if the storage is integrated part of the activity. Description of the facilities and storage rotation rules

storageRotationRules.description: Conditions of short-term storage of inputs, if the storage is integrated part of the activity. Description of the facilities and storage rotation rules

turnover.description: Time that all input resource units possibly used in the activity are completely replaced by new resource units; reasonable worst case estimator

truIds.description: Output traceable resource unit as result of the activity; status after the completion of the activity. For production steps this is usually one production lot, but also parts of it are possible.

quantityNumber.description: The net quantity of the output resource transformed in the activity.

quantityUnit.description: The measurement unit of the net quantity

isNetQuantity.description: Indicates, whether the quantity is given as a net value.

tradeUnitCount.description: The number of trade units with known net quantities, transformed in the activity

items.description: If the trade units are individually identifiable, a list of TU identifiers of trade units with known net quantity transformed in the activity, e.g. the serial extended GTINs of all TUs. Usually an identifiable TU will form their own TRU and listed as separate outputs.

tradeUnits.description: If the trade units are individually identifiable, a list of TU identifiers of trade units with known net quantity transformed in the activity, e.g. the serial extended GTINs of all TUs. Usually an identifiable TU will form their own TRU and listed as separate outputs.

useStart.description: Start of time period, when the output resource unit was transformed in the activity

useEnd.description: End of time period, when the output resource unit was transformed in the activity

ambientControl.description: Conditions of short-term storage, if the storage is integrated part of the activity. Description of the facilities and storage rotation rules

storageRotationRules.description: Conditions of short-term storage, if the storage is integrated part of the activity. Description of the facilities and storage rotation rules

productionLineDescription.description: Identification of the production line, if not sufficient specified in the establishment, e.g. several production lines in one establishment.

productionLinePictures.description: Pictures of the production line to support verbal description

equipment.description: Short description of the equipment, devices and manual processing of the production line

cleaning.description: Date and time of the last complete cleaning of the production line, storage facility, or transportation mean before the activity

extent.description: Description of similar activities in the context of the actual one, e.g. production of similar lots, other products on same production line, using the same devices etc.

continuousActivity.description: Is the activity a continuous process?

items.description: Treatments influencing the food safety, direct handling of ingredients.

processingSteps.description: Treatments influencing the food safety, direct handling of ingredients.

items.description: Judgement on the change of risk in general terms

foodSafetyChange.description: Judgement on the change of risk in general terms

hygiene.description: Important criteria to check the activity, parameters to control food hygiene

qualityControlCompliance.description: Any information showing compliance or non-compliance of results of process / quality control of the actual activity

hygieneControlCompliance.description: Any information showing compliance or non-compliance of  results of hygiene control of the actual activity

auditTraceability.description: Description of quality of the traceability system at the establishment according to the audit.

storageConditionsCompliance.description: Any information showing compliance or non-compliance of storage conditions, when part of the actual activity

transportConditionsCompliance.description: Any information showing compliance or non-compliance of transport conditions, when part of the actual activity

borderEu.description: Indicator if activity includes import or export of products in or out of the EU

investigationId.description: Investigation under which the activity was traced

documentation.description: Documentation of the corresponding process of the actual activity, e.g. detailed description of processing steps and parameters

monitoringQuality.description: Results of process / quality monitoring of the actual activity

monitoringHygiene.description: Results of hygiene monitoring of the actual activity

monitoringStorage.description: Results of storage monitoring, when part of the actual activity

monitoringTransport.description: Results of transport monitoring, when part of the actual activity

certificate.description: Declarations and certificates for import or export

order.description: Relevant information describing the motive of the activity

comments.description: Any comments regarding the activity, mentionable factors, which might have impact on the investigations.

investigations.description: Investigation, when entry was evaluated and eventually updated

lastEvaluationAt.description: Date and time of the last evaluation of this entry

description.description: Short description of the establishment or transportation mean to distinguish different establishments or transportation means of the same food business operator (transportation: of the same forwarding company, e.g. trailer, truck; trader: e.g. consumer, case of the disease/outbreak)

contactFbo.description: Responsible food business operator, contact for information; if transport: forwarding company

items.description: The transportation mean is the unit moving one or several logistic units.

transportationMean.description: The transportation mean is the unit moving one or several logistic units.

name.description: Name of the establishment, preferable as registered in official registers, e.g. approval according EC853/2004, national farm register etc.

addressStreet.description: Address to identify the physical location of the establishment; transport: where the transportation mean is regularly checked, cleaned, maintained, supplied

addressNumber.description: Address to identify the physical location of the establishment

addressOther.description: Anything in addition to the address information

addressBuilding.description: Address to identify the physical location of the establishment

addressZip.description: Address to identify the physical location of the establishment

addressCity.description: Address to identify the physical location of the establishment

addressCounty.description: Address to identify the physical location of the establishment

addressCountry.description: Address to identify the physical location of the establishment

latitude.description: Geospatial coordinates for use in GIS systems, e.g. taken from registration or generated from the address or GPS information

longitude.description: Geospatial coordinates for use in GIS systems, e.g. taken from registration or generated from the address or GPS information

items.description: Division of the food chain into sectors; where actors have to follow specific legislations.

sector.description: Division of the food chain into sectors; where actors have to follow specific legislations.

items.description: Stages adapted to the food chains of specific sectors. Products will follow these typical stages through the food chain.

stage.description: Stages adapted to the food chains of specific sectors. Products will follow these typical stages through the food chain.

pictures.description: Pictures of the establishment to support the verbal description

activityStart.description: Time when the establishment started to become active

activityEnd.description: Time, when establishment stopped being active

extent.description:
Station_Actor: Description of the stages in the food chain done in the establishment, including a summary on production lines
Station_Storage: Detailed description of the storage facilities e.g. separated locations, buildings, stores, their storage conditions. Additional activities being done in the establishment, e.g.  freezing, sorting, splitting, mixing, packing.
Station_Transport: Description of regular use of the transportation mean, other transportation means of the forwarding company
Station_Trader: Detailed description of the activities of the trader or consumer.

storageDescription.description: Description of the intermediate (short-term) storage facilities and storage rotation rules, if storage is not main purpose of the establishment (Class not Storage)

transportDescription.description: Description of the intermediate transport means and conditions, if transport is not main purpose of the establishment (Class not Transport)

items.description: Storage conditions regarding separation of products

storageSeparation.description: Storage conditions regarding separation of products

items.description: Storage / Transport conditions regarding ambient control

ambientControl.description: Storage / Transport conditions regarding ambient control

storageRotationRules.description: System in place to manage storage rotation

cleaningPeriodDescription.description: Time between two complete cleanings of the storage

cleaningPeriodDays.description: Time between two complete cleanings of the storage

hygieneControlCompliance.description: Any information showing compliance or non-compliance of results of hygiene control

auditTraceability.description: Description of quality of the traceability system at the establishment according to the audit.

registrationScheme.description: The scheme where the establishment is registered. This could be the e.g. approval according EC853/2004 for establishments handling products of animal origin, national farm register, certification schemes for primary production etc. ("offical/legal registration"); transport: The scheme where the transportation mean is registered, e.g. the registration number of a lorry, flight number. Further registrations, certifications or other identifications of the establishment; Station_Actor, Station_Storage: E.g. the Global Location Number (GLN) (not an official/legal registration); Station_Transport: E.g. for vessels International Maritime Organisation (IMO) number or the International Radio Call Sign (IRCS).

registrationNumber.description: Registration number in the scheme, e.g. the approval number, the GLOBALG.A.P. number etc.; also the Global Location Number (GLN)

registrationType.description: Indicator if the registration is done individually or on cooperative level. (Station_Transport: E.g. forwarding company)

haccp.description: Relevant parts of the HACCP plan, if available.

qualityPlan.description: Relevant parts of the quality plan, if available.

hygieneMonitoring.description: Results of hygiene monitoring of the actual activity

storageMonitoring.description: Results of monitoring, when part of the actual activity

comments.description: Any comments regarding the establishment, which might have impact on the investigations.

investigations.description: Investigation, when entry was evaluated and eventually updated

lastEvaluationAt.description: Date and time of the last evaluation of this entry

description.description: Short description of the food business, e.g. usual or brand names

name.description: Official name of the food business as registered

addressStreet.description: Official postal address of the food business as registered

addressNumber.description: Official postal address of the food business as registered

addressBuilding.description: Official postal address of the food business as registered

addressZip.description: Official postal address of the food business as registered

addressCity.description: Official postal address of the food business as registered

addressCounty.description: Official postal address of the food business as registered

addressCountry.description: Official postal address of the food business as registered

latitude.description: Geospatial coordinates for use in GIS systems, e.g. taken from registration or generated from the address or GPS information

longitude.description: Geospatial coordinates for use in GIS systems, e.g. taken from registration or generated from the address or GPS information

activityStart.description: Start of time period, when the food business was active, or time, when establishment started

activityEnd.description: End of time period, when the food business was active, or time, when establishment started

registrationScheme.description: Registration of the food or feed business or case identification for consumer; also other registrations, certifications or other identifications of the food business, e.g. the first digits of the Global Trade Item Number (GTIN) identifying the company

registrationNumber.description: Registration number in the scheme, e.g. the approval number, the GLOBALG.A.P. number etc.; also the Global Location Number (GLN)

registrationType.description: Indicator if the registration is done individually or on cooperative level.

contacts.description: Contact persons in the food business or responsible authority to contact for retrieval of information

comments.description: Any comments regarding the activity, mentionable factors, which might have impact on the investigations.

investigations.description: Investigation, when entry was evaluated and eventually updated

lastEvaluationAt.description: Date and time of the last evaluation of this entry

statusDescription.description: Short description of the status to distinguish different TRUs of the same lot at the same location and time

lotOrLuId.description: Lot/LogisticUnit of the traceable resource unit

stationId.description: Location of the traceable resource unit

statusStart.description:
Start of time period, when the traceable resource unit was in this status, esp. when the status comprises not recorded storage. 
Elsewise, end is missing

statusEnd.description:
End of time period, when the traceable resource unit was in this status, esp. when the status comprises not recorded storage. 
Elsewise, end is missing

netAmountQuantity.description: The net quantity of the traceable resource unit at this status

netAmountUnit.description: The measurement unit of the net quantity

tradeUnitCount.description: The number of trade units with known net quantities of the traceable resource unit at this status

items.description: If the trade units are individually identifiable, a list of TU identifiers of trade units with known net quantity of the traceable resource unit at this status, e.g. the serial extended GTINs of all TUs

tradeUnits.description: If the trade units are individually identifiable, a list of TU identifiers of trade units with known net quantity of the traceable resource unit at this status, e.g. the serial extended GTINs of all TUs

extent.description: Similar traceable resource units of the same lot at the same location

pictures.description: Pictures of the traceable resource unit to support verbal description

storageConditionsCompliance.description: Results showing compliance or non-compliance of previous storage conditions

transportConditionsCompliance.description: Results showing compliance or non-compliance of previous transport conditions

imexportRegulationsCompliance.description: Results showing compliance or non-compliance of import / export regulation

comments.description: Any comments regarding the activity, mentionable factors, which might have impact on the investigations.

investigations.description: Investigation, when entry was evaluated and eventually updated

lastEvaluationAt.description: Date and time of the last evaluation of this entry

shortDescription.description: Short description of the lot to distinguish from other lots of the same product

lotIdentifier.description: Lot identifier as given by the producer, e.g. the extended GTIN

netAmountQuantity.description: The net quantity of the complete lot

netAmountUnit.description: The measurement unit of the net quantity

tradeUnitCount.description: The number of trade units produced

items.description: If the trade units are individually identifiable, a list of TU identifiers of trade units with known net quantity, e.g. the serial extended GTINs of all TUs

tradeUnits.description: If the trade units are individually identifiable, a list of TU identifiers of trade units with known net quantity, e.g. the serial extended GTINs of all TUs

labelPictures.description: Pictures of the label to document lot information

productionPeriodStart.description: Start of time period, when the lot was produced

productionPeriodEnd.description: End of time period, when the lot was produced

firstSaleOn.description: Date, when the lot was first on the market

items.description: Specific production methods, if not part of the product specification

productionMethodsClass.description: Specific production methods, if not part of the product specification

certificates.description: Specific certificates of origin, traditional production etc., if not part of the product specification

countryOfOrigin.description: Country of origin, if not part of the product specification

qualityAndGradingClass.description: Quality and size of the lot, if not part of the product specification

additionalSpecifications.description: Other amendments to the product specifications relevant for this lot

comments.description: Any comments regarding the activity, mentionable factors, which might have impact on the investigations.

investigations.description: Investigation, when entry was evaluated and eventually updated

lastEvaluationAt.description: Date and time of the last evaluation of this entry

registrationScheme.description: Identification scheme and number of the logistic unit, as container number, Serial shipping Container Code (SSCC), Postage ID, or internal number of the logistic provider

registrationNumber.description: Identification scheme and number of the logistic unit, as container number, Serial shipping Container Code (SSCC), Postage ID, or internal number of the logistic provider

description.description: Description of constitution, packing material, total weight etc.

pictures.description: Pictures of the logistic unit to support verbal description

loadingDate.description: Start of time period, when the logistic unit was formed

unloadingDate.description: Time when logistic unit was unloaded

protectionType.description: Description of measures to protect the logistic unit against unauthorized opening

sealNumber.description: Number of protection seal, if applicable

truId.description: Traceable resource unit, packed into the LU

netAmountQuantity.description: The net quantity of the resource unit.

netAmountUnit.description: The measurement unit of the net quantity

tradeUnitCount.description: The number of trade units with known net quantities, packed into the LU

items.description: If the trade units are individually identifiable, a list of TU identifiers of trade units with known net quantity packed into the LU, e.g. the serial extended GTINs of all TUs.

tradeUnits.description: If the trade units are individually identifiable, a list of TU identifiers of trade units with known net quantity packed into the LU, e.g. the serial extended GTINs of all TUs.

comments.description: Any comments regarding the activity, mentionable factors, which might have impact on the investigations.

investigations.description: Investigation, when entry was evaluated and eventually updated

lastEvaluationAt.description: Date and time of the last evaluation of this entry

description.description: Short description of the product, e.g. as given in the product specification of the producer

producer.description: Food business operator responsible for the production of the product

labelName.description: Product name as given on the label and/or to the consumer

registrationScheme.description: Global or internal identification of the product, e.g. GTIN, article number

registrationNumber.description: Global or internal identification of the product, e.g. GTIN, article number

productionPeriodFrom.description: Period when the product was produced according this specification

productionPeriodUntil.description: Period when the product was produced according this specification

packageType.description: Classification of the product according to packaging status for the consumer

foodEx2Code.description: Classification of products according to main ingredients / types of products

isReadyToEat.description: Indicator, if the product is ready-to-eat

productionExtent.description: Description of similar products, e.g. only different consumer packages, slightly different recipes

productPictures.description: Pictures of the product to support verbal description

otherIdentifiers.description: Additional identification numbers, mainly internal identification by producer, wholesaler, clients

legalName.description: Product name according to the appropriate legislation

speciesName.description: Scientific name for products of one main ingredient, if applicable

items.description: Specific production methods, if not part of the product specification

productionMethods.description: Specific production methods, if not part of the product specification

productionMethodsOther.description: Specific production methods, if not part of the product specification

certificates.description: Specific certificates of origin, traditional production etc., if not part of the product specification

countryOfOrigin.description: Country of origin, if not part of the product specification

lotQualityAndGrading.description: Quality and size of the lot, if not part of the product specification

tradeUnitNetAmountQuantity.description: The net quantity of one trade unit

tradeUnitNetAmountUnit.description: The measurement unit of the net quantity

tradeUnitCode.description: Product number (GTIN) of the trade unit, if applicable

consumerUnitsPerTradeUnit.description: Number of consumer units per trade unit

consumerUnitNetAmountQuantity.description: The net quantity of one consumer unit

consumerUnitNetAmountUnit.description: The measurement unit of the net quantity

consumerUnitCode.description: Product number (GTIN) of the consumer unit, if applicable

productConditions.description: Description of product conditions, e.g. fresh, frozen, protected atmosphere etc.

durability.description: Durability in months and days from date of production, if applicable

storageRecommendationsForConsumer.description: Description of storage recommendations for consumer, as written on the label

preparationRecommendationsForConsumer.description: Description of recommended preparation for consumer, as written on the label

logisticUnitPackingInstructions.description: Instructions given for forming of logistic units

qualityControlPhysicalParameter.description: Physical parameter for quality control,  tolerance ranges

qualityControlMicrobialParameter.description: Microbial parameter for quality control, maximum values

ingredient.description: Ingredients as listed in the product specification, e.g. product label, product information sheet, recipies, etc.

percentage.description: Percentage of content as listed in the product specification, e.g. product label, product information sheet, recipies, etc.

allergen.description: Allergen as listed in the product specification

comments.description: Any comments regarding the product, which might have impact on the investigations.

investigations.description: Investigation, when entry was evaluated and eventually updated

lastEvaluationAt.description: Date and time of the last evaluation of this entry

dataInputBy.description: Name of person who uploads data

dataInputTime.description: When data is attached / put in

description.description: Short description of the information source, e.g. report, product specification, invoice etc.

informationOwner.description: Owner of the information; this is usually the responsible person who created the information source and is able to correct it.

informationNumber.description: Internal identification number of the information owner, e.g. invoice number, version number etc.

createdOn.description: Creation date of the information source

updatedOn.description: Date of the current version of the information source

webSourceUrl.description: Internet access point to retrieve current versions of the information source with access details

fileSource.description: Electronic copy of the document in common file format

comments.description: Any comments regarding the information source, which might have impact on the investigations.

investigations.description: Investigation, when entry was evaluated and eventually updated

evaluatedAt.description: Date and time of the last evaluation of this entry

contextDescription.description: Short description of the context of the investigations, e.g. food sectors, countries involved, first observations, cases etc.

findings.description: Case definition and description of suspected food and feed items. Summary of epidemiological results on foodborne incident.

items.description: Type of investigations: Forward or backward tracing

type.description: Type of investigations: Forward or backward tracing

contaminationType.description: Classification in chemical and microbial contaminations

referenceActivity.description: Activity, for which the investigation period is evaluated, e.g. consumption during the investigation period. In outbreak investigations this is consuming. For recall this is producing.

start.description: Time period for investigating the food and feed supply chain.

end.description: Time period for investigating the food and feed supply chain.

number.description: Number and title of RASFF notification

title.description: Number and title of RASFF notification

mandates.description: Mandates and Term of References for the investigation

reports.description: All relevant reports related to the investigations

comments.description: Any comments regarding the activity, mentionable factors, which might have impact on the investigations.

evaluatedAt.description: Date and time of the last evaluation / update of this entry

description.description: Description of any register to obtain external for tracing, e.g. national list of approved establishments, regional FBO register, certification schemes, national case register etc.

isLegalRegister.description: Flag indicates, whether this register is an offical/legal registration scheme, e.g. from a federal state of municipality (in contrast to other registration schemes like organic food labels).

levelOfRegistration.description: Sets the level the register is focused on.

institution.description: Competent authority or institution maintaining the register

comments.description: Any comments regarding the activity, mentionable factors, which might have impact on the investigations.

evaluatedAt.description: Date and time of the last evaluation of this entry

name.description: Name of the responsible contact person or unit for functional contacts

role.description: Short description on responsibilities at FBO, e.g. general contact, contact for specific food sectors, establishments, investigations etc., deputy

addressOther.description: Anything in addition to the postal address information

addressStreetVisitor.description: Visitor's address to meet in person

addressNumberVisitor.description: Visitor's address to meet in person

addressOtherVisitor.description: Anything in addition to the visitor's address information

addressBuildingVisitor.description: Visitor's address to meet in person

addressZipVisitor.description: Visitor's address to meet in person

addressCityVisitor.description: Visitor's address to meet in person

addressCountyVisitor.description: Visitor's address to meet in person

addressCountryVisitor.description: Visitor's address to meet in person
